title: I can't use use my skin (With proof)
body:
My friend gift me Dawnbringer Riven because i help him with his mission, Since yesterday (24 june) I can't use it and its pretty anoying
Here some picture that proof that i receive it and i can't use it
https://gyazo.com/72efad2422a00c9fee023e038e76aa5e
https://gyazo.com/8f73b8bd4456e4608401f9a5a7ef1160

Thanks for further answer
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I see i checked with him he got an chargeback do i get my skin back if he pay is back? Or it an loss ?
He got permabanned, we don't know why for now, he gifted me the skin the day before he got banned, maybe that's why
If they issued a chargeback then they didn't use an rp card. That would mean they couldn't have done a chargeback. Means you have some talking to do with this friend of yours
He purchase skin with rp pre-buy card So i don't how he can reverse it

It looks like the person who sent that gift issued a chargeback with their bank after gifting you that skin. Since that purchase was reversed and their money returned, items purchased were refunded as well.
